Agent.Name: Calculator Agent
Agent.Description: An agent that performs simple mathematical calculations

Skills.Name: Addition
Skills.Description: Add two numbers. Takes only two numbers as input

Skills.Name: subtraction
Skills.Description: subtract two numbers. Takes only two numbers as input

Skills.Name: multiplication
Skills.Description: multiply two numbers. Takes only two numbers as input

Skills.Name: division
Skills.Description: divide two numbers. Takes only two numbers as input
